</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Firebrands](/Sources.aspx?ID=196) pg. 82 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 30 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Hands** 2

**Bulk** 1
</row>

**Access** Second-mark members of the Firebrands have access to this item.

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This satchel contains all the basic equipment found in a [climbing kit](/Equipment.aspx?ID=14) plus the specialized equipment—including a harness, belay device, and locking clips—needed for descents. When [Climbing](/Actions.aspx?ID=33) down with a rappelling kit, you move twice as fast as usual based on your check result.
